channel.title: Opinions on a Minecraft sub-forum?
channel.description:
It most probably won't happen, but who knows. Just leave your opinion in the poll. :D
I mean, when you look at it... the most activity the general section has had in ages ever since the minecraft topics started popping up, and david and lin hosted the official moparscape minecraft server.

item.title: Opinions on a Minecraft sub-forum?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Well as people can see, this has been set-up.
Congratulations.

Read full topic

item.title: Opinions on a Minecraft sub-forum?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Going onto MITB provided laughs.

Saw h1 sk1llers demise.

OT:

Sub-forum maybe?

I was thinking of someone setting up a small smfforfree just for the community server. Nothing like adding a complete sub-forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Opinions on a Minecraft sub-forum?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:26, topic:376586”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=472513.msg3456009#msg3456009 date=1294031711]
Well the sites not about minecraft…but it does seem to play a roll here, there is however a games section on mitb.

I think MITB should just open up another site based on general cheating and hacking. One that can cover all consoles…

http://moparisthebest.com/smf ?
[/quote]

It doesn’t cover all consoles… It’s more computers and phones and cars…[/quote]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,1.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,42.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,34.0.html

Any could be used to talk about games

item.title: Opinions on a Minecraft sub-forum?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

A minecraft forum may be a good idea, I know I personally have been writing mods and even open source implementation of the server on my down time. Seems to be a bit more than a phase since I have seen topics on it in multiple sections of MITB and moparscape over the past 6 months.

Read full topic

At MoparScape? No. At Moparisthebest, maybe.
[/quote]God, there’s tons of sub forums there[/quote]
Correct, but that is another forum basically. It’s nothing related to MoparScape (as far as RSPS), it covers real life stuff basically. This forum does not though.

item.title: Opinions on a Minecraft sub-forum?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:10, topic:376586”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=472513.msg3455643#msg3455643 date=1294014971]
You’re suggesting making a sub-forum for a game completely unrelated to the game this forum revolves around?

Let me analogize:

Forum of Stuff
-Board of related stuff
-Board of more related stuff

  • BOARD FOR UNRELATED STUFF BUT TRYING TO BE RELATED
    -Board for related stuff and such

Do you see something wrong with the above picture my friend?
[/quote]I actually didn’t suggest anything, I just wanted to see how the poll goes tbh…

[quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=472513.msg3455647#msg3455647 date=1294015084]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=472513.msg3455633#msg3455633 date=1294014655]

[quote author=Rich link=topic=472513.msg3455627#msg3455627 date=1294014564]
If you were going to do that you may as well just add a sub-forum for all gaming in general.
[/quote]Kinda right, but it’s very popular on this forum and it can’t do must, if any harm.

As I stated in the other thread, no. It just seems like a waste. A thread is fine. I’d say a sticky at best.
[/quote]I believe you “quit”.

Yes, but this isn’t about ingame. This is about the forum. I don’t agree with a sub section for something which most likely won’t last.
[/quote]Correction: You didn’t last.[/quote]

I find it quite saddening that you must target people to hide the truth. This is the second time you’ve tried to show aggression towards me for posting my opinion.

Read full topic
